h2_title: All 6 Black Myth: Wukong Buddha's Eyeball Locations
h3_title: Black Myth: Wukong Buddha's Eyeball 2 Location
content: The next Buddha's statue can be found along the right path in Squall Hideout. Along the right side of the area, you will find some rafters with Blazebones enemies. Pass the chest, head up, and kill them. Interact with the Buddha statue at the top.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Buddha's_Eyeball_Locations.md', within the main section titled 'Buddha's Eyeball Locations', specifically from the subsection 'All 6 Black Myth: Wukong Buddha's Eyeball Locations' and the sub-subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Buddha's Eyeball 2 Location'.
The content is as follows:
The next Buddha's statue can be found along the right path in Squall Hideout. Along the right side of the area, you will find some rafters with Blazebones enemies. Pass the chest, head up, and kill them. Interact with the Buddha statue at the top.
